## Chess.get() method

Returns the piece on the square.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get(square?: string): Piece | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  square | string | e.g. 'e4' |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Piece](./chess.js.piece.md) \| null
